#How to compile and install Vala Toys for GEdit

== Prerequisites ==

 * glib (at least 2.12.0)
 * gtk+ (at least 2.10.0)
 * gedit (at least 2.22.0)
 * gtksourcecompletion (at least 0.5.0) http://gtksourcecomple.sourceforge.net/ Debian packages at [http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=212508&package_id=255603&release_id=620105 source forge]
 * gnome build framework (at least 2.23.90) 
 * vala 0.5.2 (svn trunk)

== Compiling ==

First at the moment you need vala compiler 0.5.2 - trunk:

{{{
svn checkout http://svn.gnome.org/svn/vala/trunk
}}}
You can compile _Vtg_ with:

{{{
./configure --prefix="your home dir"/.gnome2/gedit/plugins --datadir="your home dir"/.gnome2/gedit/plugins
./make
}}}

== Installing ==

From the root folder of Vtg distribution:

{{{
mkdir ~/.gnome2/gedit/plugins/vtg
cp -r images/ ~/.gnome2/gedit/plugins/vtg/
cp vtg/vtg.gedit-plugin ~/.gnome2/gedit/plugins/
cp vtg/.libs/libvtg.so ~/.gnome2/gedit/plugins/
}}}
